name: Ambience Collector
description:
This  field recording based ambience experinece is my first creation using both Unity and Wwise as softwares, it allows the player to create soundscapes through the collection of flames while enjoying new noises as they are introduced into to world. 

Controls:

  • WASD walk
  • Mouse to look
  • Shift to walk quicker
  • There is no jump
  • Be patient and enjoy the ambiences, although there is a structure and orbs to collect and sounds to explore don’t let it rush you through the experience.
